sentences: Eric Matthew Simonoff (born July 21, 1967) is a literary agent at William Morris Endeavor.
Eric Simonoff was born to a Jewish family  in Philadelphia on July 21, 1967.
He spent most of his childhood in Cherry Hill, New Jersey.
He graduated from Princeton University in 1989, with a degree in Classics.
Simonoff began his publishing career at W.W. Norton as an editorial assistant, then joined Janklow & Nesbit in 1991 and rose to the position of co-director.
He left Janklow & Nesbit for William Morris Endeavor in 2009.
